column3: $3.35 prior to tax- Not that I had much room for dessert
column4: but I still wanted something sweet to end this meal. So my husband and I opted to share an individual serving. This serving really is perfect for 1 person (or 2 full people). The cookie and ice cream was a good match and would love to order the larger serving ($6.65 prior to tax
column6: if you want to order this dessert
column7: let your server know ahead of time because it does take some time to make.
